entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ogoki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:15 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -23.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ogoki Post Airport 6:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -23.9°C
Pressure: 103.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 49 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -31.6°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:50 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:50 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:50 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
